actions.committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Education and Labor.

official_title: A bill to amend the National Labor Relations Act to secure to physically handicapped workers, employed in sheltered workshops the right to organize and bargain collectively, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Allows physical handicapped workers employed in sheltered workshops to organize and bargain collectively under the National Labor Relations Act.

titles.title: A bill to amend the National Labor Relations Act to secure to physically handicapped workers, employed in sheltered workshops the right to organize and bargain collectively, and for other purposes.
